name: Sarah Johnson
helpOffered: Can assist with photography and creating digital artwork.
story: Sarah is an art student with a passion for capturing the beauty of everyday life through her camera lens. She loves to help others bring their ideas to life with design.

name: Michael Lee
helpOffered: Can help with coding, building websites, and debugging.
story: Michael is a computer science major who enjoys problem-solving and teaching others how to create their own websites and applications.

name: Emily Williams
helpOffered: Can tutor in mathematics and help with homework.
story: Emily is a math whiz and loves tutoring her peers. She enjoys breaking down complex problems into simple steps to make math more accessible.

name: David Brown
helpOffered: Can teach basic cooking skills and share nutrition tips.
story: David is a culinary student who is passionate about healthy eating. He enjoys teaching others how to cook simple, nutritious meals on a budget.

name: Laura Davis
helpOffered: Can assist with writing essays, editing, and proofreading.
story: Laura is an English major who loves to help her peers express their ideas through writing. She enjoys polishing drafts and improving writing skills.
